description:
Fire Signs (Aries, Leo, Sagittarius) have plenty of room and time to work on their personal passions this year. Uranus is still in the heart of Aries, so there may be times when you need to remind yourself to not wander off too far on your own.火象星座（白羊座、狮子座、射手座）今年有充分的空间和时间，去追求自己的个人激情。天王星仍然在白羊座的中心，所以今年有些时候你需要提醒自己不要脱离了自己的正轨。

Earth Signs (Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn) Work with greater care and then you should experience few - if any - mistakes or misunderstandings. Things will go so smoothly that it may seem too good to be true.土象星座（金牛座、处女座、摩羯座）：工作时需要更谨慎小心，这样你才能尽可能地避免错误和误解。一切都会很顺利，甚至会让你觉得太好了而有点不真实。

Air Signs (Gemini, Libra, Aquarius) may feel more comfortable in 2016 than they did in 2015. Teamwork, communication, and mutual understanding are highlighted, so this year will feel natural to you.风象星座（双子座、天秤座、水瓶座）今年会觉得比去年舒服。团队合作、沟通交流、互相理解这些元素会凸显出来，所以2016年对你来说很自然。

Water Signs (Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces) are always sensitive, and this can be an advantage for you in 2016.水象星座（巨蟹座、天蝎座、双鱼座）一直都很敏感，而这一点在2016年会成为你的一个长处。

title: 12星座的2016运势解读！
